person.persName: Isaac T. Heizer (Green County, Kentucky, blacksmith and soldier.)

body.p: Green County, Kentucky, blacksmith and soldier. Kentucky native. Married to Sarah M. Eastland Heizer in Green County, Kentucky, on August 19, 1845. Father of William B. Heizer and Mary Heizer. Blacksmith in Green County, Kentucky, in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Green County in 1860. Served in the 13th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as a first lieutenant from December 31, 1861, to April 18, 1862. Died in Hardin County, Tennessee, on April 18, 1862.
